summary:
In this work, notion of a slant helix is extended to space E$^n$. Necessary

in terms of curvature functions.

Abstract
In this work, notion of a slant helix is extended to space En . Necessary and
sufficient conditions to be a slant helix in the Euclidean n−space are presented.
Moreover, we express some integral characterizations of such curves in terms of
curvature functions.
M.S.C. 2000: 53A04
Keywords: Euclidean n-space; Frenet equations; Slant helices.
